itunes:title: 251 - 6 Tips That Helped Me Gain 20,000 New Instagram Followers in a Year
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
About a year ago I had this realization: if I had more Instagram followers, everything else I was trying to do would be easier. 

It was the domino that I had to knock over, to knock over all the others.

AND YET I wasn't pumped about it. WHY? Probably the same reasons social media frustrates you: it seems like a random lottery and nothing I ever do seems to have much of an impact.

BUT I was determined to reach my goal!!!

SO this past year I've been approaching instagram with disciplined intensity, all the while learning as much as I could about what works on this platform.

The results were super powerful and in this episode I want to share everything that had an impact on my growth!

FYI even if Instagram isn't the platform you want to succeed on, this episode will help you on whichever arena you choose to do social media battle on!
